<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/expenses/stats/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get statistics about expense tags including count and total amount

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Tag statistics","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"tag":{"type":"string","description":"Tag name used for categorization","example":"groceries","minLength":1},"count":{"type":"number","description":"Number of transactions with this tag","example":12,"minimum":0},"total":{"type":"number","description":"Total monetary value for transactions with this tag","example":450.75,"minimum":0}},"required":["tag","count","total"],"title":"TagStatistics"}}}}},"401":{"description":"User is not authorized to view tag statistics"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
